name: A flamehardened willow wand (1h)
data: It has feeble weapon class for its type (pathetic in general).
It decreases the users strength a tiny bit.
It increases the users constitution a tiny bit.
It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It increases the users intelligence a bit.
It increases the users hitpoints poorly.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It does fire damage a tiny bit.
It increases the users fire resistance strongly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
